body.name: VIAHART Brain Flakes 500 Piece Set, Ages 3+, Interlocking Plastic Disc Toy for Creative Building, Educational STEM Learning, Construction Block Play for Kids, Teens, Adults, Boys, and Girls
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 20 hrs 50 mins
features: The Signature Yellow Cap Storage Jar - Contains 500+ pcs in 12 colors; Includes an idea booklet with instructions to build a BRAIN FLAKES flower, rainbow ball, and tree; Additional building instructions and resources online providing endless creativity ideas for boys and girls

For Ages 3 to 99 - BRAIN FLAKES discs click together easily for children ages 5+; Aids in the development of fine motor skills and color learning for children 3+; A great gift for the entire family to enjoy

Why BRAIN FLAKES - A great STEM toy for developing spatial intelligence and thinking; Construct large structures with few pieces; Discs are flexible for creative open-ended building; Great screen-free and quiet-time activity
Non-Toxic and Tested for Safety - Child safe; BPA, lead, heavy metal, and phthalate free; Compliant with ASTM US CPSIA safety regulations

Engineers Start Here - A great solo or collaborative group activity for school classrooms, makerspaces, montessori, daycares, libraries, or home; Countless design possibilities and therapeutic building play
Size and Weight - The durable storage jar measures 8" (20.4cm) high, with 5.63" (14.3cm) diameter; The 500+ pcs jar weighs appx 1.9 pounds (0.9 kg) ; Discs measure 1.3" or 3.3 cm across
Manufacturer warranty - 90 day manufacturer warranty for all manufacturer’s defects

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Product Description Brain Flakes brand discs from VIAHART are a new construction toy that teaches children spatial thinking and lets imaginations run wild! Every jar contains over 500 discs, which means hours of endless fun and engineering education. In addition to brain building, Brain Flakes discs improve the coordination and dexterity of young children, keeping both their minds and bodies active! The discs measure 1.3 inches across and are 1/10th inch thick. They click together and apart easily for all ages and levels of motor skills. They come in a great reusable plastic jar (PET). The discs themselves are made from safe and tested polyethylene (PE). The cap of the jar is made from polypropylene (PP). Our discs are a revolutionary addition to the world of children's and adults' construction toys. Get a Brain Flakes set today! About the Manufacturer VIAHART was founded in 2010 with a big idea and a single product. Today, we design and manufacture hundreds of different toys and sporting goods. Our mission is to build capability and confidence in children. We are headquartered in Texas where we have a warehouse for shipping to our customers. Our products are manufactured in China, Vietnam, Indonesia, and the USA under our strict supervision. If you have a question or if there's any way we can help, please let us know!

BRAIN FLAKES Classic 500 Piece Set BRAIN FLAKES Advanced 2500 Piece Set BRAIN FLAKES Add-On 8 Sets Wheels and Axles BRAIN FLAKES Add-On 150 Piece Grey Discs Set BRAIN FLAKES 15 Step-by-Step Instructions Book BRAIN FLAKES Braingineer 3-in-1 Building Kit Recommended Ages 3+ 5+ 5+ 3+ 5+ 7+ Includes 500 Pcs 2500 Pcs 16 Wheels, 8 Axles 150 Pcs 15 Instructions 580 Pcs About the product The most popular and perfect introduction to Brain Flakes! 12 vibrant colors in a easy to carry container. Loved by kids and adults! Loved by advanced builders and teachers! Perfect for classrooms and group play. 12 vibrant colors with wheels and axles included! Make your creations VROOM! An Add-On wheels and axles set for your designs to drive around! Additional color add-on to your 12 colors set! Expand your imagination and level up vour creativity! Screen FREE! 15 simple designs for the beginners! A great combo with our classic 500pcs set! Perfect gift for vehicle lovers! Detailed instructions and pieces for you to build ALL 3 designs! Tested for Safety ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ - ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great fun and endless possibilties!
reviews.reviewText: When I bought these, I wasn't expecting much, but my students absolutely love these! They come up with so many things to build with them, and their designs are beautiful! There's a little booklet of ideas that come with them, and it's easy for my 6 and 7 year old students to follow the directions, but they also use it as inspiration for their own creations.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value. Fosters creativity.
reviews.reviewText: 500 pieces gives the opportunity for creativity. Pieces are sturdy and should last a long time.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very creative and entertaining
reviews.reviewText: Very easy to use, I just put them in the suitcase and they provided nonstop learning, creativity bright beautiful colors to bring imagination to reality. Great for both kids and parents a great conversation starter for quiet little ones.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bought these for my kids and they love playing with them for hours making creations of all sorts. I love finding toys like these that drive their creative state of mind.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Unique building toy - fun and different
reviews.reviewText: I got this toy for my granddaughter who is 3 years 9 months old.The storage bucket is pretty good, with a screw-on lid so things inside will STAY inside. The handle on the lid had a tendency to come loose, but that's not a huge issue. There were plenty of "flakes" in the bucket, in a nice variety of colors.The flakes themselves are pretty solid. They are large enough that I think it would be "difficult" for a child to choke on one, but smaller children should still be supervised. The flakes fit together by connecting slots, and snap together firmly. Each flake has 8 slots positioned evenly around the edge (so "north", "northeast", "east", "southeast", "south", "southwest", "west", and "northwest"). The sizes aren't perfect - if you attach 8 flakes to a central one, then 8 more to an outer ring, they will overlap very slightly, but not enough to make an issue. All construction will use "octagonal" forms rather than "hexagonal" which is probably easier for kids to understand. It means that structures will naturally build right angles and straight lines.The paper instructions included excellent step-by-step directions for 3 structures, showing exactly how many pieces of each color were needed and how to fit them together. There were pictures of a dozen or so other structures that could be built, with several noting that you needed more than one "bucket" to make them in the colors shown. The instructions for those items were accessible by QR-code from the manufacturer website, so not ideal for kids but reasonable especially if you were to print them ahead of time.My grandkid (not quite 4 years old) is not quite up to the recommended 5-year point but was able to connect the flakes herself into a simple straight line and then disassemble it again, but didn't quite grasp the nuance of 2-dimensional building strategy. She's probably a little too young to really appreciate them but will grow into them over the next few months. Nonetheless, she was able to use them adequately. I look forward to many years of building in the future.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These are great! But man are they hard to keep after, with a tornado child. Great toys. Super fun and easy to play with. Captivating.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple fun for wide range of ages
reviews.reviewText: Love these toys! My kindergartener asked for them after playing with some at school (and stealing a few 😬). The older kids in middle school and high school also enjoy putzing around with them and building little doo-dads.Great low cost toy/ gift!

I bought these for my daughter when she was 3. They became her favorite toy instantly and are still her favorite today. It's the only thing she will actually sit and play with for over an hour and it really gets her using her creativity. Endless possibilities.

Este es un excelente producto ideal para cualquier edad. Yo lo uso en el salon de clases ya que los alumnos se divierten mucho a la vez que desarrollan su creatividad y habilidades motoras y cognitivas. Ademas que es un producto duradero y seguro de usar. Excelente producto!

Mes petits -enfants adorent, ils peuvent créer tout et n’importe quoi avec (fleurs, arbres, tour, vaisseau spatiale….) .Les pièces s’imbriquent facilement les unes dans les autres.Jeu qui peut durer des heures….dans le calme!Je recommande ++++.
Macht Mega Spaß,für Groß und Klein.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Quick delivery! Fun to use. Can be played with from the age if 3. Very versatile, and easy to assemble. Little hands can learn how to do it very quickly. The pieces just clip nto one another.Therefore, it's excellent for fine motor skills. The pieces are large, but not too large and any age and any gender can have fun with it. The colours are very bright. Very young children could learn their colours from playing with this toy. Excellent quality and very sturdy and very well made too. When not in use, its stored in a large tub with a carrying handle. Great value for money.
